corrin17.name: Corrin
corrin17.title: Of Fates
corrin17.description: One of the Emblems who were summoned to Elyos. Resides in the Ring of the Crux of Fate. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates / Fire Emblem Engage.
corrin17.emblem:
Enhanced Engaged Special
When Special triggers, boosts damage by unit's max Special cooldown count value × 4 (excluding area-of-effect Specials).
At start of enemy phase (except for in Pawns of Loki), if there is no【Divine Vein (Icicle)】 currently applied by unit or allies, applies 【Divine Vein (Icicle)】to spaces 2 spaces away from unit for 1 turn (excluding spaces occupied by a foe, destructible terrain other than Divine Vein, or warp spaces in Rival Domains), and 【Divine Vein (Vert)】to unit's space and spaces within 3 spaces of unit for 1 turn (excluding spaces with【Divine Vein (Icicle)】applied).
【Divine Vein (Icicle)】
Applies the following status on space: Foes treat space as impassable terrain while status is active, but status is destructible (with 1 HP). When destroyed, it changes to 【Divine Vein (Vert)】. Allies can move into and occupy space. If any allies occupy spaces with Divine Vein (Icicle) applied, attacks targeting those spaces will hit the ally over destroying the Divine Vein (Icicle).
【Divine Vein (Vert)】
Applies the following effects on space for foes: Foe cannot warp from this space or into this space (does not affect units with Pass skills or warp effects from structures like camps and fortresses in Rival Domains). Inflicts 【Canto Control】on foes that trigger Canto in this space through their next action. Inflicts Atk/Spd-5 and Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat (only highest value applied; does not stack), and also, if foe's attack can trigger foe's Special, inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on foe before foe's first attack during combat (cannot exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown).
【Canto Control】
If unit's Range = 1, unit can move 1 space when Canto triggers. If unit's Range = 2, their action ends when Canto triggers.

Castle Hall:
I am an Emblem who has reached the ends of the paths before me.
But when I'm with my siblings, it's as if I have gone back to who I was before.
In Elyos, I was entrusted to Solm. I was kept in a fortress that was not dissimilar to one in Nohr or Hoshido.

In Elyos, my power manifested in the form of fog, flames, and ice pillars with Dragon Veins.
I wonder how it would manifest if you used it.
I still do not grow hungry here, but it is a wonderful feeling being able to enjoy food. Shall I gather ingredients?
I often had my ring polished at the Somniel. It sure tickled! I wonder, are you ticklish too?
Visit: I am Emblem Corrin. I see you, too, are in the midst of your journey, just like [F].
Level: This is the result of both your and my decisions. I always had faith we would make the right ones.
As an Emblem, I wish to grant you many fruitful outcomes for your journey.
There is meaning behind every experience. I shall have faith this is true and continue my journey.
Summon: I am Corrin, an Emblem. I shall fight with all my might so the path you choose leads to hope.
Learn Skill: This is a power you chose for me? Nothing could bring me more joy.
Confession:
Askr's nights are truly beautiful. The sky full of stars rivals even the world I came from, as well as Solm.
Isn't it wonderful to think about how we are just one of many possibilities shining in the night sky?
Do you suppose there are other Emblem versions of me who exist on a different path?
I am sure there is another me protecting someone with a katana, or roaring as a dragon!
But I am here with you, no matter the path you choose to take. For I believe it will lead us to where we seek.
This must be how my siblings felt, to watch over me so diligently. Thanks to you I share their sentiments.
Status: I can imagine the look on my siblings' faces if they saw me like this.
*gasp* Oh. *giggle* For a second, I didn't see you there.
My memories of Elyos and of the three paths are what shaped me into who I am.
The Northern Fortress of Solm is where my ring was... I also spent much time in the Northern Fortress of Nohr.
"Bare your fangs, Emblem of Fates" is the invocation to summon me. I hope you try it someday.
Seadall is a wonderful dancer. His long, flowing hair reminds me of Azura...
It is not up to Emblems to decide the world's fate. In Elyos, Alear decides, and here, it is up to you to forge a path into the future.

lyn10.name: Lyn
lyn10.title: Plains Wind
lyn10.description: Disciple of the light goddess Naga. Though she cannot remember her past, she remains firm in her convictions. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade / Shadows.

Castle Hall: The wind feels...welcoming. This is a nice place, isn't it?
Is...something wrong? The way you're staring at me... Is there something on my face?
Leave any bandits to me. I can't tolerate those who would harm people just trying to live their lives.
My hearing is top-notch, and I'm fast too. When someone calls for help, I'm usually the first to arrive.
You and I appear quite different at a glance, but...we share a desire to look out for the well-being of others.
Visit: Um... My appearance? Is something off? Well, I brought you this greeting from [F].
Level: There's a gentle wind blowing... I feel as if it's trying to guide me.
I want to save everyone. I believe that's what my power is meant for.
I'm sorry. I guess I'm not at my best right now.
Summon: I am Lyn. I'm told I am a disciple of light, guiding others toward Naga's ideals, but... Um. What is this place?
Learn Skill: Thank you. I hope you can see how grateful I am.
Confession:
I... The first thing I recall is being in a field, not knowing where I came from or who I was. I remembered nothing.
A disciple of light... That's what they called me. Meant to guide the world toward Naga's ideals or something...
Then, I felt like someone was calling me, and suddenly I was here. It's all quite...confusing.
But, wherever this is, and whoever I am...what I must do stays the same.
I will protect the oppressed. That is the cause I will champion.
Status: My name is Lyn. I remember nothing more...
*startle* Is this how you normally greet each other in this world?
You arrived from another world too? Then we have that much in common.
It's peculiar, but I get the feeling this isn't the first time we've met.
Regardless of the world we're in, the most important thing is that everyone can be happy, wouldn't you agree?
I will never forgive those who destroy the happiness of others.
My mind is at ease when I'm with you. This wind...it carries whispers of the past.
